trans-unit.source: Related and linked resources in the tile gallery
trans-unit.target: Related and linked resources in the tile gallery

trans-unit.source: Learn about related and linked resources that are displayed in the tile gallery of the Azure preview portal.
trans-unit.target: Learn about related and linked resources that are displayed in the tile gallery of the Azure preview portal.

trans-unit.source: The tile gallery enables you to find tiles for a particular resource and drag them onto your current blade.
trans-unit.target: The tile gallery enables you to find tiles for a particular resource and drag them onto your current blade.

trans-unit.source: Using the tile gallery, you can create management views that span resources.
trans-unit.target: Using the tile gallery, you can create management views that span resources.

trans-unit.source: For any specified resource, the related resources include all of the resources that share the same resource group as the resource, and any resources that link to or from the resource.
trans-unit.target: For any specified resource, the related resources include all of the resources that share the same resource group as the resource, and any resources that link to or from the resource.

trans-unit.source: Linking is a feature of the Azure Resource Manager.
trans-unit.target: Linking is a feature of the Azure Resource Manager.

trans-unit.source: It enables you to declare relationships between resources even if they do not reside in the same resource group.
trans-unit.target: It enables you to declare relationships between resources even if they do not reside in the same resource group.

trans-unit.source: Linking has no impact on the runtime of your resources, no impact on billing, and no impact on role-based access.
trans-unit.target: Linking has no impact on the runtime of your resources, no impact on billing, and no impact on role-based access.

trans-unit.source: It's simply a mechanism you can use to represent relationships so that tools like the tile gallery can provide a rich management experience.
trans-unit.target: It's simply a mechanism you can use to represent relationships so that tools like the tile gallery can provide a rich management experience.

trans-unit.source: Your tools can inspect the links using the links API and provide custom relationship management experiences as well.
trans-unit.target: Your tools can inspect the links using the links API and provide custom relationship management experiences as well.

trans-unit.source: When you create resources through the portal or by deploying a template through Azure PowerShell or Azure CLI, links are automatically created for some dependent resources.
trans-unit.target: When you create resources through the portal or by deploying a template through Azure PowerShell or Azure CLI, links are automatically created for some dependent resources.

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically link resources by using the <linkText>Linked Resources REST API</linkText><title></title> or by declaring the relationships in the template.
trans-unit.target: You can also programmatically link resources by using the <linkText>Linked Resources REST API</linkText><title></title> or by declaring the relationships in the template.

trans-unit.source: For a complete discussion of working with linked resources, see <linkText>Linking resources in Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For a complete discussion of working with linked resources, see <linkText>Linking resources in Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: If you need an introduction to writing Azure Resource Manager templates, see <linkText>Authoring templates</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: If you need an introduction to writing Azure Resource Manager templates, see <linkText>Authoring templates</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: To dive into greater detail about creating links between resources, see <linkText>Linking resources in Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: To dive into greater detail about creating links between resources, see <linkText>Linking resources in Azure Resource Manager</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: To understand more about working with resource groups through the preview portal, see <linkText>Using the Azure Preview Portal to manage your Azure resources</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: To understand more about working with resource groups through the preview portal, see <linkText>Using the Azure Preview Portal to manage your Azure resources</linkText><title></title>.
